The pH 5.5 formula respects your skin‚Äôs natural balance, leaving it soft and refreshed. It‚Äôs great for purifying without stripping, removing excess oil and dirt gently. Plus, it‚Äôs vegan and cruelty-free!Perfect for all skin types, especially those with redness or sensitivity. Overall, a fantastic soothing and hydrating toner that delivers visible results. Highly recommended!

Okay, this toner is that girl! I‚Äôve been using the Anua Heartleaf 77% Toner every day for the past couple months and my skin has never looked so calm and clear. I have sensitive, breakout-prone skin and this seriously helps keep the redness down and my skin feeling super fresh. It‚Äôs super lightweight (basically feels like water) but somehow still gives that nice hydrated glow.I use it morning and night, and it layers perfectly with the rest of my skincare‚Äîno burning, no irritation, just soft, happy skin. Plus, it doesn‚Äôt have that heavy fragrance or sticky feeling some toners do.If your skin gets easily mad or you just want something soothing and simple, you need this. Only downside is I go through the bottle kinda fast because I use it like water üòÇ but it‚Äôs 100% worth it.üíö Pros: calming, gentle, non-sticky, hydrates without cloggingüö´ Cons: runs out fast if you use it twice a day

products.product: Aquaphor Lip Repair Ointment, Moisturizing Lip Bal

sample_reviews.text:
I‚Äôve been really happy with Aquaphor Lip Repair Ointment and it‚Äôs one of the most reliable things I‚Äôve found for truly dry lips. It feels more like a treatment than a regular chapstick. Instead of being waxy and disappearing quickly, it goes on smoothly and forms a protective layer that helps lock in moisture, so my lips stay comfortable for a long time.It‚Äôs especially helpful when my lips are cracked from cold weather, dry air, or just getting dehydrated. I‚Äôll put a layer on and I can actually feel the difference pretty quickly, less tightness and less flaking. I also like using it before bed, and when I wake up my lips still feel soft instead of dried out again.The pack is convenient too because I can keep one in my purse and one at home. Overall, it‚Äôs a great value for something that actually works, and I‚Äôd definitely repurchase if you deal with dryness often.
  
Read more

This is honestly the best chapstick I‚Äôve ever tried, and I‚Äôm a chapstick addict. I‚Äôve tried handfuls of both natural chapsticks (Burt‚Äôs bees, badger, evanhealy, etc) as well as standard ones (Chapstick brand, EOS, etc) and none of them TRULY got rid of the chapped lips and made them smooth. Exfoliating my lips, drinking a lot of water, using a lot of chapstick, using a little, etc nothing would help. It was to the point I was considering lip filler to ‚Äúhydrate‚Äù and smooth out my lips because it always looked so.. dehydrated. Just not plump and never smooth.Then I tried this aquaphor lip repair and it was an instant game changer. No weird white lines on my inner lips from buildup, not just a bandaid over dry lips, no chapstick ‚Äúaddiction‚Äù where my lips would sting if I didn‚Äôt apply more. Super hydrated, smooth, soft lips with this. I will be a forever customer, assuming it doesn‚Äôt get discontinued and the formula doesn‚Äôt change. ALSO clean on Yuka üëèüèºüëèüèº

products.product: BIODANCE Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask, Hydrating Ov

sample_reviews.text:
My initial encounter with these was until TikTok but I ordered them from Amazon for myself and my daughter for convenience and Prime shipping. There were two choices I think the one is a four-pack and the one I got is a 16 pack. The 16 pack will last you 4 months if you're doing it once a week as instructed.I open the top and two sides when I'm doing it just to have accessibility and to be able to use the remnants liquid in the pack after I'm done applying the facial part I put the liquid in the pack on my neck and chest.They are a little slippery when you take them out. I watched a video on how to apply it and did the bottom part first and then the top part sometimes I have to snip the top part near the nose to get it to fit properly but you don't have to in general.There are three pieces that are left over the two eye pieces and the lip piece. You can put them below your eyes or above your eyes on your brows and then put the mask over them which is what I do. Or you can put them under your eyes and put the mask over them but I find it doesn't absorb all the way in that location due to the double thickness I guess. The lip one you can put over your lip or put it on vertically over your throat where the skin can get a little saggy.Once you have it on it's best to sit back and relax for 30 minutes or so at about a 45¬∞ angle so it doesn't slip off. After about 10 to 15 minutes it doesn't slip around as much and after 30 it's obviously started absorbing and tends to stay pretty well.I haven't noticed any staining on the pillows or anything like that from it and by morning actually by 4 hours later it's completely absorbed and all you have left on your faces the plastic that it was attached to. You just pull that off and throw it away. It's white when you put it on and it's clear when it absorbs.I definitely noticed an improvement in my skin quality and the collagen sinks in easily and less about a week. I am a redhead with delicate skin and I haven't had any reaction to this product at all I know that other masks have caused problems for friends but I've used this one for over a year now and I love it. My daughter and I both use it weekly and they're easy to take with you if you're traveling great way to pamper your skin after a day outside on the beach.The price is reasonable for what it is and what it does. I've gotten several compliments on my skin and I'm over 60 so that saying something for the results!All in all this is a very good product, it doesn't smell and doesn't seem to have any impurities like some others. My skin isn't irritated by it and looks great afterwards. If you're wondering if it washes off once it's soaked in you can wash your face all you want but you're just going to have beautiful glowing cheeks. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this or give it as a gift!
  
Read more

I have been using two Biodans masks: the Real Deep Mask (bought in December) and the Rejuvenating Mask (bought in September).Both masks work really well. My skin feels soft, smooth, and hydrated after each use.The Real Deep cleans deeply, and the Rejuvenating makes my skin feel refreshed and glowing.I'm very satisfied and recommend both masks!
  
Read more
